title: Unified Portfolio & Feature Viewer
description: Merge pv and fv into single TUI with 4-level navigation: Portfolio → Project → Epic → Feature

title: Edit Mode - Add/Delete/Modify Features
description: Enable editing features.json from within the TUI. Add/remove/modify tickets, change status, edit fields. Track dirty state and save changes back to file.
steps: Add 'e' key to enter edit mode on feature view
Implement inline field editing (title, status, description)
Add 'n' key to create new feature in current epic
Add 'd' key to delete feature (with confirmation)
Track dirty flag for unsaved changes
Implement save with 'w' key (write to features.json)
Warn on quit if unsaved changes

title: Archive Epics via UI
description: Add ability to archive completed epics from within the TUI. Archived epics would be hidden from default view but preserved in features.json with an archived tag/field. Similar interaction pattern to pv-002 editing.
steps: Add archived: true field support to epic/feature schema
Filter archived epics from default view (show with toggle)
Add archive action in epic view (e.g. A key)
Add visual indicator for archived items when shown

title: Tree View Mode
description: Add collapsible tree view for portfolio-wide visualization with project→epic→feature hierarchy, inline dependency annotations, and search/filter capabilities.

title: Unified filter cycling
description: Replace a/z toggle filters with single f key that cycles through filter modes: open → all → active → stalled. Reduces hotkey sprawl and follows existing sort cycle pattern.
